titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Vintage Equipment Collection RG.011
titlestmt.author: Lindsay Anderberg

publicationstmt.publisher: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

address.addressline: Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-03-12 13:23:29 -0500.

repository.corpname: Poly Archives at the Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology, NYU Libraries

did.abstract: The items in this collection relate to the fields of electrical and civil engineering, as well as supplemental equipment, and were used by engineers in the early to mid 20th century.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The items in this collection were transferred to the Poly Archives by various university departments. The most prominently represented departments include Civil Engineering and Electrical Engineering.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Equipment in this collection includes items civil and electrical engineers would have used in the early to mid 20th century. Surveying equipment, such as a theodolite and transit, as well as electrical engineering instruments, such as a decade capacitor, decade resistor, potentiometer, and volt meter are included. The equipment ranges in date from the early to mid 20th century.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Items in this collection are arranged alphabetically.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is currently on display in the Bern Dibner Reading Room of the Bern Dibner Library of Science & Technology.
Please contact the archives to view items in this collection.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish materials must be obtained from:
Poly Archives & Special Collections Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology 5 MetroTech Center Brooklyn, NY 11201

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Please observe copyright restrictions. Permission to view materials does not confer permission to reproduce or publish.
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date; RG-011: Vintage Equipment Collection; box number; folder number; Poly Archives & Special Collections at Bern Dibner Library of Science and Technology.
